<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/156850</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>156850</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2754</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Radioactive decay and the concept of half life</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radioaktiver Zerfall und das Konzept der 
Halbwertzeit</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Affaiblissement radioactif et le concept de la 
demi vie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Deterioração radioativa e o conceito da meia 
vida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Deperimento radioattivo ed il concetto del 
periodo radioattivo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ραδιενεργός αποσύνθεση και η έννοια της μισής ζωής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Decaimiento radiactivo y el concepto de la media 
vida</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">An animation which demonstrates the radioactive decay of 3 different elements; (Carbon 14, plutonium and Radon,) and how this relates to their half life.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radioactivity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">half life</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Animation, die den radioaktiven Zerfall von 
3 unterschiedlichen Elementen zeigt; (Carbon 14, Plutonium und 
Radon) und wie dieses auf ihrer Halbwertzeit in Verbindung steht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une animation qui démontre l'affaiblissement 
radioactif de 3 éléments différents ; (carbone 14, plutonium 
et radon) et comment ceci associe à leur demi vie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um animation que demonstre a deterioração 
radioativa de 3 elementos diferentes; (carbono 14, plutônio e 
radon) e como isto se relaciona a sua meia vida.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una animazione che dimostra il deperimento 
radioattivo di 3 elementi differenti; (carbonio 14, plutonio e 
radon) e come questo si riferisce al loro periodo radioattivo.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια ζωτικότητα που καταδεικνύει τη ραδιενεργό 
αποσύνθεση 3 διαφορετικών στοιχείων  (Ανθρακας 14, 
πλουτώνιο και ραδόνιο) και πώς αυτό αφορά τη μισή ζωή τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una animación que demuestra el decaimiento 
radiactivo de 3 diversos elementos; (carbón 14, plutonio y 
radón) y cómo esto se relaciona con su media vida.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Radioaktivität</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Halbwertzeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">radioactivité</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">demi vie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">radioactivity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">meia vida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">radioattività</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">periodo radioattivo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ραδιενέργεια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μισή ζωή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">radiactividad</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">media vida</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
